title: The Game - Kirsten Backhard
description: Kirsten Backhard is a highly respected senior negotiating executive based in Toronto. She plays with some of the most powerful men in her field. Kirsten is confident, sexy, and hell on heels. She fights with a straight face, doesn’t back down easily, and believes in using her ASSets to get the deal done her way. Kirsten loves toying with the game in a man’s world.But is every angle of her life this easy to play? One night can easily change everything. What she thinks is all love and fairy tales quickly becomes highly overrated. Will Kirsten be able to overcome? Or will she remain the cool poker player?Contains crude language, sexual intercourse, and really bad jokes.Get your one-click finger ready for this HOT HOT HOT book!! Anticipated release early fall, 2013
author: Shawnte Borris
